snippet: Mr. Putin said a plan to isolate the Internet in Russia was only intended as a backup security system to keep Russian domains online in a national emergency.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin throws his support behind plan to isolate the Internet in Russia from the rest of the World Wide Web; says government will not censor Internet sites; contends plan is intended to build a backup system to keep websites in the Russian domains online in a national emergency.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Putin said a plan to isolate the Internet in Russia was only intended as a backup security system to keep Russian domains online in a national emergency.

headline.main: Putin Supports Project to ‘Secure’ Russia Internet
headline.print_headline: Putin Supports Project to ‘Secure’ Russia Internet
